title: Shark learns pretty quickly that it definitely shouldn't mess with a pod of hippos
text:
Shark learns pretty quickly that it definitely shouldn't mess with a pod of hippos 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
One small bull shark thought it would be a good idea to corner a pod of hippos at the iSimangaliso Wetland Park in KwaZulu-Natal, South Afri...
